Columbia.Reformation Lutheran Church (Columbia, S:
Reformation Lutheran Church is a church in Columbia, South Carolina, and part of the South Carolina Synod of the Evangelical Lutheran Church in America.


== History ==


== About ==
As a member of the Reconciling In Christ initiative of the ELCA(RIC) the church is committed to providing worship programs, ministries and pastoral care to all, regardless of age, gender identity, sexual orientation, marital status, religious background, color, economic status, or national origin. It is the only Reconciling in Christ Congregation in South Carolina.
